project_title: Personalized Multimodal Interfaces for Assistive Technologies
description:
Designing a multimodal interface system that adapts to individual user needs for assistive technologies. The system will integrate speech, gesture, and eye-tracking inputs to provide seamless interaction for users with physical or cognitive impairments. The project focuses on creating a personalized and inclusive user experience.

The system will need to:
1. Process and integrate multimodal inputs (speech, gestures, eye-tracking)
2. Adapt the interface dynamically based on user preferences and behavior
3. Provide real-time feedback and error correction
4. Ensure accessibility and usability for diverse user groups

The initial implementation will target assistive communication devices, with the goal of expanding to smart home control systems.
